A request that returns some information about one item that is known either by coorindate or ID. More...

Get reply.
Methods to get the information about the items.

Methods to get the information about the items. All these methods returns pointers into the packet, this means that the pointer will be invalid after this request is deleted!

  • uint32 getReplyNbrFields (uint32 i) const

Detailed Description

A request that returns some information about one item that is known either by coorindate or ID.

Definition at line 36 of file ItemInfoRequest.h.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum ItemInfoRequest::state_t [private]
 

The possible states of this object.

Enumeration values:
AWAITING_INDATA  Waiting for indata.
SENDING_COORDINATE_REQUEST  Sending coordinate request to the map module.
AWAITING_COORDINATE_REPLY  Waiting for the coordinate reply packet that contains information about the item that is close to the given coordinates.
SENDING_ITEMINFO  Sending item info request to the map module.
AWAITING_ITEMINFO  Waiting for the item info reply packet.
DONE  This request is done.
ERROR  Something has gone wrong.

Definition at line 209 of file ItemInfoRequest.h.

const char* ItemInfoRequest::getReplyItemFieldname (  uint32  itemNbr,
uint32  fieldNbr
)  const
 

Get a pointer to one of the fields for item number itemNbr.

Valid values are { 0 <= itemNbr < getNbrReplyItems()} and { 0 <= fieldNbr < getReplyNbrFields(itemNbr)}.

Parameters:
itemNbr The index of the item to get field name for.
fieldNbr The index of the field to get the name for.
Returns:
A pointer to a char* that contains the name of field number fieldNbr for item nbr itemNbr.

ItemInfoEnums::InfoType ItemInfoRequest::getReplyItemType (  uint32  itemNbr,
uint32  fieldNbr
)  const
 

Get the type of information for a field.

Parameters:
itemNbr The index of the item.
fieldNbr The index of the tuple for the item.
Returns:
The type of information that the tuple is.

const char* ItemInfoRequest::getReplyItemValue (  uint32  itemNbr,
uint32  fieldNbr
)  const
 

Get a pointer to the value of one of the fields for item number itemNbr.

Valid values are { 0 <= itemNbr < getNbrReplyItems()} and { 0 <= fieldNbr < getReplyNbrFields(itemNbr)}.

Parameters:
itemNbr The index of the item to get value for.
fieldNbr The index of the field to get the value for.
Returns:
A pointer to a char* that contains the value of field number fieldNbr for item nbr itemNbr.

void ItemInfoRequest::processPacket (  PacketContainer *  pack  )  [virtual]
 

Handle a reply from the modules.

Will either result in that the request is ready or more packets to send to the modules.

Parameters:
pack The packet that is returned from the modules.

Implements Request.
